issue.title: [CF 1556] Universal Food/Rune/Flask checking on a unit.
issue.body:
Is there a way for easy tracking of food/rune/flask buffs? Can you add this in future?


> Posted by CurseForge user BloodCaster | Imported from CurseForge issue #1556 | Raw

comments.body:
No, not something I'd add. Just make buff/debuff icons that track the ones you care about. All food buffs are called "Well Fed", and there's only one rune and 4 flasks that are current to the expansion.

Edited Aug 20, 2018

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
